scripts.dev: node_modules/.bin/stylus --watch --out static static/index.styl & node_modules/.bin/pug --watch static --name-after-file --pretty --no-debug & node-dev ./server ~/audio & wait
scripts.build: sh -c 'node_modules/.bin/stylus --out static static/index.styl; node_modules/.bin/pug static --name-after-file --pretty --no-debug; rm -rf build; mkdir build; cd build; electron-packager .. auditor --overwrite --platform linux --prune=true --version-string.CompanyName=Wartech --version-string.FileDescription=Wartech --version-string.ProductName=Auditor; for i in *; do zip -r $i.zip $i; done'
